name: adonis-fullstack-app
description: The fullstack application boilerplate for Adonisjs

scripts.migration: ENV_SILENT=true node ace migration:run --force && ENV_SILENT=true node server.js
scripts.reset: ENV_SILENT=true node ace migration:reset --force && ENV_SILENT=true node ace migration:run --force && ENV_SILENT=true node ace seed --force && ENV_SILENT=true node server.js
scripts.devreset: node ace migration:reset --force && node ace migration:run --force && node ace seed --force
